remarks: The "inclusion functor" from the category of non-unital rings into the category of extensible structures.  (Contributed by AV, 30-Mar-2020.)
statement:
rngcifuestrc.r $e |- R = ( RngCat ` U ) $.
rngcifuestrc.e $e |- E = ( ExtStrCat ` U ) $.
rngcifuestrc.b $e |- B = ( Base ` R ) $.
rngcifuestrc.u $e |- ( ph -> U e. V ) $.
rngcifuestrc.f $e |- ( ph -> F = ( _I |` B ) ) $.
rngcifuestrc.g $e |- ( ph -> G = ( x e. B , y e. B |-> ( _I |` ( x RngHomo y ) ) ) ) $.
rngcifuestrc $p |- ( ph -> F ( R Func E ) G ) $.
$d R x y $.
$d U x y $.
$d ph x y $.
